entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
